Posts.Content: Does PMPS ( along with other mental health issues ) qualify you to be "disabled"???  Seriously, I will either become a drug addict or I will kill my doctor (j/k)!  The pain is there 24/7 and I can't take it.  Just wondering if anyone has been assigned "disabled" because of it. thanx in advance stellinator
Posts.Title: Post mastectomy pain syndrome....disability???
